title: qut student anyone?
body: looking for a team or people that goes to qut

replies.body:
Hi! If you're wanting to meet QUT players there's a QUT League of Legends Facebook group:  **https://www.facebook.com/groups/QUTLeagueofLegends/**

If you're also interested in the Oceanic Collegiate Championships, we have signups where we're putting people into teams (see the pinned post) or you could check out this post which is on the board: **http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/oceanic-university-championship/5nj095tE-official-qut-oceanic-university-championships**
